languages.text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.
languages.original_text:
До конца боя архмилитант может совершать 1 дополнительную атаку в ход (в том числе в ход применения этих {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}). Следующая атака после применения этой способности и первые атаки в каждый последующий ход не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
До конца боя архмилитант получает штраф −30 к Выносливости, а также в начале каждого своего хода получает прямой урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Эффект, связанный с получением урона, можно снять с помощью лечения.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Veteran can make 1 additional attack each turn (including 1 additional attack on the turn the desperate measure was used). First attack after the use of this ability and each turn afterwards costs 0 AP. The Veteran suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness until the end of combat and gains bleeding. Bleeding: This creature is bleeding and suffers 10% of their maximum wounds damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any medication.

Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness until the end of combat and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

languages.text:
首席战士每回合都可以额外进行一次攻击（使用此{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力的当前回合就可以发动额外攻击），效果持续至战斗结束。使用此能力之后的首次攻击，以及接下来每个回合中的首次攻击都不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
首席战士的坚韧降低30点，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，首席战士在回合开始时会受到直击伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。直击伤害的效果可以通过治疗移除。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
首席战士每回合都可以额外进行一次攻击（使用此{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}能力的当前回合就可以发动额外攻击），效果持续至战斗结束。使用此能力之后的首次攻击，以及接下来每个回合中的首次攻击都不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
首席战士的坚韧降低30点，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，首席战士在回合开始时会受到直击伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。直击伤害的效果可以通过治疗移除。

首席战士每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都可以额外进行一次攻击（使用{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}的当前回合就可以发动额外攻击），效果持续至战斗结束。使用此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后的首次攻击，以及接下来每个回合中的首次攻击都不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 首席战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}会承受-30{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此外，首席战士还会承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。 流血：该生物在回合开始时会受到流血{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，流血伤害为{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的10%。此效果可以被任何治疗效果移除。

languages.text:
Hasta el final del combate, el Ataque puede lanzar un ataque adicional cada turno (incluyendo un ataque adicional el turno en el que usa esta {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}). El primer ataque lanzado tras usar esta capacidad y cada turno subsiguiente cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
El Archimilitante sufre una penalización de −30 a su Resistencia hasta el final de combate y, al comienzo de cada uno de sus turnos, sufre daño directo igual al 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con cualquier tipo de curación.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
Hasta el final del combate, el Ataque puede lanzar un ataque adicional cada turno (incluyendo un ataque adicional el turno en el que usa esta {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}). El primer ataque lanzado tras usar esta capacidad y cada turno subsiguiente cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
El Archimilitante sufre una penalización de −30 a su Resistencia hasta el final de combate y, al comienzo de cada uno de sus turnos, sufre daño directo igual al 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con cualquier tipo de curación.

languages.text:
戦闘終了時まで、アーク・ミリタントは毎ターン1回追加攻撃できる（{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}が使用されたこのターンの追加攻撃1回を含む）。このアビリティを使用した後、最初の攻撃と以降のターンの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが0になる。
戦闘終了までアーク・ミリタントのTGHが−30のペナルティを受ける。また、アーク・ミリタントのターン開始時には、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10%分の直接ダメージを受ける。この効果は回復手段で打ち消すことができる。
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘終了時まで、アーク・ミリタントは毎ターン1回追加攻撃できる（{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}が使用されたこのターンの追加攻撃1回を含む）。このアビリティを使用した後、最初の攻撃と以降のターンの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが0になる。
戦闘終了までアーク・ミリタントのTGHが−30のペナルティを受ける。また、アーク・ミリタントのターン開始時には、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷の最大値{/g}の10%分の直接ダメージを受ける。この効果は回復手段で打ち消すことができる。

戦闘終了時まで、アーク・ミリタントは毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}1回追加攻撃できる({g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}苦肉の策{/g}が使用されたこのターンの追加攻撃1回を含む)。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用した後、最初の攻撃と以降のターンの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが0になる。 戦闘終了までアーク・ミリタントの{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}耐久性{/g}が-30の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ペナルティ{/g}を受け、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}状態になる。 出血：この生物は出血しており、ターン開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大傷{/g}の10%分の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。この効果はあらゆる回復手段で打ち消すことができる。

languages.text:
До конца боя архмилитант может совершать 1 дополнительную атаку в ход (в том числе в ход применения этих {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}). Следующая атака после применения этой способности и первые атаки в каждый последующий ход не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
До конца боя архмилитант получает штраф −30 к Выносливости, а также в начале каждого своего хода получает прямой урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Эффект, связанный с получением урона, можно снять с помощью лечения.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя ветеран может совершать 1 дополнительную атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (в том числе в ход применения этих {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}). Следующая атака после применения этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и первые атаки в каждый последующий ход не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Ветеран получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} до конца боя, а также эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}. Кровотечение: персонаж страдает от потери крови и в начале своего хода получает урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.

До конца боя ветеран может совершать 1 дополнительную атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (в том числе в ход применения этих {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}). Следующая атака после применения этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} и первые атаки в каждый последующий ход не требуют затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Ветеран получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} до конца боя, а также эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}. Кровотечение: персонаж страдает от потери крови и в начале своего хода получает урон, равный 10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.

languages.text:
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Erzmilitant pro Zug einen zusätzlichen Angriff ausführen (einschließlich eines zusätzlichen Angriffs in dem Zug, in dem diese {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} eingesetzt wurde). Der erste Angriff nach dem Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit und in jedem nachfolgenden Zug kostet 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Der Erzmilitant hat bis zu Ende des Kampfes einen Abzug von -30 auf seine Zähigkeit. Zu Beginn jedes Zuges erleidet der Erzmilitant direkten Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Der zweite Effekt kann durch Heilung entfernt werden.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Erzmilitant pro Zug einen zusätzlichen Angriff ausführen (einschließlich eines zusätzlichen Angriffs in dem Zug, in dem diese {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} eingesetzt wurde). Der erste Angriff nach dem Einsatz dieser Fähigkeit und in jedem nachfolgenden Zug kostet 0 {g|Encyclopedia:AP{/g}.
Der Erzmilitant hat bis zu Ende des Kampfes einen Abzug von -30 auf seine Zähigkeit. Zu Beginn jedes Zuges erleidet der Erzmilitant direkten Schaden in Höhe von 10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Der zweite Effekt kann durch Heilung entfernt werden.

languages.text:
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'archimilitant peut lancer 1 attaque supplémentaire par tour (y compris lors du tour pendant lequel cette {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g} est utilisée). La première attaque qui suit l'utilisation de cette capacité et chaque tour ultérieur coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'archimilitant subit une pénalité à l'Endurance de -30 et, au début de chacun de ses tours, il subit des dégâts directs égaux à 10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Ce deuxième effet peut être supprimé par des soins.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'archimilitant peut lancer 1 attaque supplémentaire par tour (y compris lors du tour pendant lequel cette mesure désespérée est utilisée). La première attaque qui suit l'utilisation de cette capacité et chaque tour ultérieur coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'archimilitant subit une pénalité à l'Endurance de -30 et, au début de chacun de ses tours, il subit des dégâts directs égaux à 10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Ce deuxième effet peut être supprimé par des soins.

languages.text:
Başmilitan, çatışma sonuna dek (bu {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemin{/g} kullanıldığı tur da dâhil olmak üzere) her turda birer ilave saldırı yapabilir. Bu kabiliyeti kullandıktan sonraki ilk saldırı ile sonraki turlarda yapılan ilk saldırıların {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli 0'dır.
Başmilitan, Dayanıklılık niteliğine −30 ceza puanı alır ve turu her başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar doğrudan hasara maruz kalır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. İkinci etki, iyileştirilerek ortadan kaldırılabilir.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant suffers a −30 penalty to their Toughness and, at the start of each the Arch-Militant's turn, they suffer direct damage equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The latter effect can be removed by healing.

traits.locale_text:
Başmilitan, çatışma sonuna dek (bu {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlemin{/g} kullanıldığı tur da dâhil olmak üzere) her turda birer ilave saldırı yapabilir. Bu kabiliyeti kullandıktan sonraki ilk saldırı ile sonraki turlarda yapılan ilk saldırıların {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli 0'dır.
Başmilitan, Dayanıklılık niteliğine −30 ceza puanı alır ve turu her başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u kadar doğrudan hasara maruz kalır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. İkinci etki, iyileştirilerek ortadan kaldırılabilir.

languages.text:
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant can make one additional attack each turn (including one additional attack on the turn this {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} was used). The first attack after using this ability and each turn afterward costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Until the end of combat, the Arch-Militant has their Toughness reduced by −30 and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The level of bleeding is equal to 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
